data.title: What are the characteristics of broad-minded people?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 4): What are the characteristics of broad-minded people?

A broad-minded person would have the following characteristics:

 * vast knowledge about a variety of topics
 * is humble, and never boastful
 * is honest with himself and others
 * has high standards, but is not afraid to be ...
